app.name: Cisco Ready Connected Experience
app.description: Provides a comprehensive view and analytic to Sales Leaders and Sales Teams on their Installed Base Opportunities and Performance related to Product Refresh, Services Renew and Attach

app.name: Cisco Ready Business Object
app.description: Provides adhoc analysis and data exploration capabilities on Installed Base data; track and report on Services Metrics

app.name: SFDC Competitive Dashboard
app.description: Provides Sales leadership the ability to quickly inspect the SFDC competitive landscape

app.name: Services Leadership Dashboard
app.description: Provides a comprehensive view of Services installed base Opportunities for TS Renew & TS Attach.

app.name: Reporting Center
app.description: Provides fast and easy way to request Smart IB for Customer, Partner or Distributor.

app.name: AS Demand Gen
app.description: Sales Prospecting Tool for Advanced Services Offers with Services Recommendation.
